Dr. Justus Hunter. Co-Mentor: Living the Historic Faith: Christian ... United Theological Seminary, Associate Professor of Church History (2020-Present) ...
Dr. Justus Hunter is a tenured professor at United Theological Seminary in Dayton, Ohio. He teaches vital courses for the training of Methodist clergy.
